content: At consolidated level, including the discontinuing operations, adjusted EBITDA increased to $21.3 million compared to $18.9 million in the year-ago quarter. At a consolidated level, including discontinued operations, adjusted net income increased to $14.1 million or $0.35 per diluted share compared to $12.9 million or $0.32 per diluted share in the year-ago quarter. At consolidated level, including discontinuing operations, net income was $26.7 million or $0.66 per diluted share compared to $27.3 million or $0.67 per diluted share in 2021.
